description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: A post-timeskip technique where Luffy throws his arms in a meandering snake-like fashion before gripping the opponent's body tightly like a snake biting its prey. Effective even underwater.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy uses this technique to attack Hody Jones underwater and force him to release Shirahoshi, breaking one of Hody's ribs in the process.

description: Allows the user to mark someone as a target by touching them with their bare hand. Any object thrown with that same hand will lock on and chase the target relentlessly.

users.circumstances: Vander Decken IX ate this fruit and used it to stalk Shirahoshi for years. His defeat by Hody in episode 560 effectively ends his use of this power in the arc.

weaknesses.weakness: Effects are nullified if the user dies or falls unconscious
